trans-unit.source: Provides data for the events in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control that change the position of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> 주석의 위치를 변경 하는 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: The AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs class is used for the two annotation-positioning events, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>, in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs 클래스로 주석 위치 지정 두 개의 이벤트에 대 한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs.Annotation%2A> property gets the annotation object that is being positioned.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs.Annotation%2A>속성 배치 하는 주석 개체를 가져옵니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs.Annotation%2A>

trans-unit.source: This class also contains properties that retrieve the new location, width, height and anchor location of the annotation that is repositioned.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스에는 새 위치, 너비, 높이 및 앵커 위치 위치가 변경 되는 주석의 검색 하는 속성도 포함 되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs>클래스</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs> 의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The Annotation property allows the developer to set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation> properties during the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: 주석 속성을 사용 하면 설정 하려면 개발자 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation>동안 속성이 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>의 이벤트는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new anchor location of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 주석의 앵커 새 위치를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object that represents the new anchor position.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> 새 앵커 위치를 나타내는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new annotation anchor point X location.
trans-unit.target: 새 주석 앵커 포인트 X 위치를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> events are raised, the NewAnchorLocationX property determines the new X coordinate of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>발생 하는, NewAnchorLocationX 속성 새 주석의 X 좌표를 결정 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: This information is useful when the annotation is newly anchored to a data point.
trans-unit.target: 이 정보는 주석이 새로 데이터 요소에 고정 하는 경우에 유용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the new annotation anchor point X location.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> 새 주석 앵커 포인트 X 위치를 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new annotation anchor point Y location.
trans-unit.target: 새 주석 앵커 포인트 Y 위치를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events are raised, the NewAnchorLocationY property determines the new Y coordinate of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>발생 하는, NewAnchorLocationY 속성 주석의 새 Y 좌표를 결정 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: This information is useful when the annotation is newly anchored to a data point.
trans-unit.target: 이 정보는 주석이 새로 데이터 요소에 고정 하는 경우에 유용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value representing the new annotation anchor point Y location.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> 새 주석 앵커 포인트 Y 위치를 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new X coordinate location of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: X 좌표 위치 주석의 새 설정 하거나 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events are raised, the NewLocationX property defines the X-coordinate location of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>발생 하는, NewLocationX 속성 주석의 X 좌표 위치를 정의 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the new X coordinate location of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> 새 X 주석의 좌표 위치를 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new Y coordinate of the annotation location.
trans-unit.target: 주석 위치의 새 Y 좌표를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events are raised, the NewLocationY property defines the Y-coordinate location of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>발생 하는, NewLocationY 속성 주석의 Y-좌표 위치를 정의 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the new Y coordinate of the annotation location.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> 주석 위치의 새 Y 좌표를 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new location and size of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 새 위치 및 크기 주석의 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new height of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 주석으로 새 높이 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events are raised, use the NewSizeHeight property to determine the new height of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>발생 하는 주석으로 새 높이 결정 하 NewSizeHeight 속성을 사용 하십시오.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: This information can be used when you resize the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 주석의 크기를 조정할 때이 정보를 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the new height of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> 주석으로 새 높이 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new width of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 주석으로 새 너비를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events are raised, use the NewSizeWidth property to determine the new width of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>발생 하는 주석으로 새 너비를 확인 하려면 NewSizeWidth 속성을 사용 하십시오.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: This information can be used when you resize the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 주석의 크기를 조정할 때이 정보를 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the new width of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> 주석으로 새 너비를 나타내는 값입니다.
